titulo: Reglas en Español sobre el Valor de Inversión de Warren Buffet [Rules in Spanish on Warren Buffet's Investment Value]: Aprendemos Observando
descripcion: This book includes information on value investment, insights I have pointed down as a result of studying Mr. Warren Buffet's investment style. I lay out these insights for beginners, passive investors, active investors, and those planning to run a partnership or conglomerate. The key objective of the book is to showcase the fundamental value investment points that have observed from the best investor of the 21st century.
